title: Plastic pollution: how humans are turning the world into plastic - UNEP
body: This video is a collaboration with UN Environment and their Clean Seas campaign, If you want to take action to turn the tide on plastics, go to cleanseas and make your pledge. We also partnered with askscience on reddit - on you can talk to experts and ask questions about about plastic pollution today! Sources used in the video. Plastic ...
readable_content: - Hi! I see that you mentioned the source, what specifically would you want to focus on regarding this article?
summary:
I would like to focus on the sentiment of the article regarding the decision to ban plastic straws.
